div.p: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to record a finding code.

ul.li:
Include codes from
http://snomed.info/sct where constraint = (<<404684003 | clinical findings|)

description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to record a finding code.
